data.text:
@gillianoberholzer @neilbosworth @yasserogier @lylenutt @stefanbar 

Found the issue - it is because of a service change I made when we did optimizations.
This would have been terribly difficult to catch in testing as it is really a weird case scenario.

I need to release the service to fix.
It will take me a minute to do if we can arrange this? @neilbosworth

card.name: CW - GCCW181 - Debt review verification error
